word:
(1869) 2T 352
     600. Grains and fruits prepared free from grease, and in as natural a condition as possible, should be the food for the tables of all who claim to be preparing for translation to heaven. 
     [LARD NOT USED IN WHITE HOME--APPENDIX I:4] 
     [CAMP MEETING FOOD TO BE SIMPLE AND FREE FROM GREASE--124] 
     [GREASY MIXTURES NOT USED IN THE WHITE HOME--APPENDIX I:21]
